skill.name: get_distance_to_nearest_object
skill.description: Retrieve the distance and orientation to the mobile robot's nearest object using LiDAR sensor data

states.name: starting
states.action: Prepare the system to begin receiving LiDAR sensor data.

states.name: execute
states.action: Retrieve the current distance and orientation of the robot's nearest object and store it as output.

states.name: completing
states.action: Print the retrieved distance and orientation.

states.name: resetting
states.action: Shut down processes used to obtain the LiDAR sensor data.
